mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MYTRANS( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, IS_SHARED, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, USER_ID, GROUP_TRAN_ID) VALUES( SEQ_MYTRANS.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{isShared}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{userId}, #{groupTransId})

INSERT INTO GROUPTRANS( TRAN_ID, TITLE, TRANS_DATE, ORIGINAL_AMOUNT, CATEGORY, TYPE, MEMO, GROUPB_ID, NICKNAME) VALUES( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{transDate}, #{originalAmount}, #{category}, #{type}, #{memo}, #{groupBId}, #{nickName})
